content: Injustice and Oppression to Be Punished
Rather, your iniquities have been barriers
and your sins have hidden his face from you
For your hands are defiled with blood,
they rely on empty pleas, they speak lies,
Their webs cannot serve as clothing;
Their works are works of iniquity,
their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity,
The way of peace they do not know,
Their roads they have made crooked;

And as for me, this is my covenant with them, says the : my spirit that is upon you, and my words that I have put in your mouth, shall not depart out of your mouth, or out of the mouths of your children, or out of the mouths of your children’s children, says the , from now on and forever.
